Snorkel (Blue, M)
Male01_JewelLeftEar_snorkel_02_description
A blue tube that swimmers can breath through to be able to remain underwater for a long time. (Jewelry; worn on the left ear)[#Legal]
Un tube bleu par lequel les nageurs peuvent respirer pour rester sous l'eau pendant un long moment. (Bijoux; porté sur l'oreille gauche)[#Legal]
Ein blaues Rohr, mit dem Schwimmer unter Wasser atmen und so länger tauchen können. (Schmuck, wird am linken Ohr getragen)[#Legal]
Un tubo blu attraverso il quale respirare mentre si nuota, in modo da poter tenere il viso sott'acqua a lungo (accessorio: da indossare sull'orecchio sinistro).[#Legal]
Un tubo azul para que los bañistas puedan respirar y mantenerse bajo el agua durante un largo periodo de tiempo. (Joyas; se ponen en la oreja izquierda).[#Legal]
長時間、水中を動くことができるようになる、青色の吸気管。（ジュエリー・左耳に装着します）[#Legal]
오랜 시간 물 아래서 움직일 수 있는 파란색의 흡기관. (왼쪽 귀의 악세사리입니다)[#Legal]
This blue snorkel allows you to breathe while moving underwater. (Jewelry/Equips to left ear)[#Legal]
可以長時間於水中移動時呼吸空氣的藍色呼吸管。(配件/佩戴於左耳)[#Legal]
可以長時間於水中移動時呼吸空氣的藍色呼吸管。(配件/佩戴於左耳)[#Legal]
A blue tube that swimmers can breath through to be able to remain underwater for a long time. (Jewelry; worn on the left ear)[#Legal]
